name: SPAD
description: Searchpad is a platform that combines advanced content creation tools with SocialFi capabilities, aiming to revolutionize how creators, traders, and communities interact within Web3. Built on the Solana blockchain, the platform features AI-powered utilities for content creation (e.g., images,videos, presentations, data visualizations & many more) alongside on-chain functionalities such as wallet-based login, SocialFi elements such as creator following and tipping systems. It provides an immersive ecosystem where users can create, enage, and collaborate seamlessly.
